definition: Mt Yangming in Hunan/Mt Yangming in north Taiwan, near Taibei
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Yeah, do you know what type of people often come to visit Yangmingshan these days?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，你猜现在经常来阳明山的是哪些人？

sentences.english: No wonder. Last time when I went to Yangmingshan National Park, there was a smell of sulphur in an area.
sentences.chinese: 难怪我上次去阳明山国家公园时，闻到一股硫磺味。

sentences.english: We will picnic in mountain of Yangming.
Lily:You just want to save money. We always go to Yangmingshan. I am so bored of it.
sentences.chinese: 你就是不想花钱，每次都去阳明山，我都看腻了。

sentences.english: Last Sunday I went to Yang Ming Shan Park with my parents.
sentences.chinese: 上周日我和我的父母去阳明山公园。

sentences.english: Doris:There is snow on Yangmingshan. Let's go visit the mountain together.
sentences.chinese: 阳明山下雪了耶，我们一起上山去看好不好。

sentences.english: This is one of the most interesting sight during the early summer in the …
sentences.chinese: 这是阳明山区初夏的溪流中有趣的景观。

sentences.english: We will take a trip to Yangmingshan on the eighth of April.
sentences.chinese: 四月八日我们要去阳明山旅行。

sentences.english: Yang Ming Mountain has some good hiking trails that are not too strenuous for the kids to climb.
sentences.chinese: 阳明山有些不错的健行步道，小孩去爬也不会太费力。

sentences.english: For practicing our skills, we went to Mount Yangming to take pictures.
sentences.chinese: 我们到阳明山拍照以联系拍照技术。

sentences.english: Chungshan Hall, National Dr. Sun Yat-sen Application Form for Group Visit.
sentences.chinese: 国立国父纪念馆阳明山中山楼管理所团体参观申请表。

sentences.english: It's really nice, I can finally climb the Mountain Yangming .
sentences.chinese: 真棒，这样我可以去爬阳明山了。

sentences.english: Ecological tour guide in Yang-ming-shan National Park.
sentences.chinese: 阳明山国家公园生态导览。

sentences.english: The hot springs in Yanmingshan can be divided into three types according to their chemical composition.
sentences.chinese: 阳明山的温泉依它的成分可以分为三类。

sentences.english: They go north along the west coast, to enjoy the hot springs in Yangmingshan National Park.
sentences.chinese: 他们沿着西岸北上，到阳明山国家公园享受温泉。

sentences.english: I'm going to go hiking on Yangmingshan. Do you want to join me?
sentences.chinese: 我明天要去阳明山健行。你要和我一块去吗？

definition: Beitou or Peitou district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Puli, town in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
Taroko gorge national park in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], Taiwan/Taroko ethnic group Taiwan
Yilan city and county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], northeast Taiwan
Jiaoxi or Chiaohsi township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
Nantou city and county in central Taiwan
Tainan (city and county in Taiwan)
Wulai township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Sun Moon Lake in Nantou County, Taiwan
Miaoli city and county in northwest Taiwan
Kenting, a national park on the southern tip of Taiwan, popular as a tourist destination (abbr. for 墾丁國家公園|垦丁国家公园[Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2])
Xinyi or Hsinyi district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan/Hsini district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
Jiayi or Chiayi city and county in west Taiwan
Hualien, city and county on the east coast of Taiwan
Xinzhu or Hsinchu city in northern Taiwan, noted for high tech industries/Xinzhu or Hsinchu county in northwest Taiwan
